settings.name: Settings
settings.description: The variables will impact on the building status, according to your preferences.
settings.cookies: Use cookies to store my preferences and settings

help.name: Help
help.building: Clicking on any building will display more detailed information, like if it owns departments, classrooms and predictions about the capacity.
help.colorWifidown: Status of the element wifi download.
help.colorWifiUp: Status of the element wifi upload.
help.variables: You can weight each element in settings, affecting in higher or lower percentage to the general building status.
help.alarms: Alarms can be created from the detailed information selecting a building, and will popup whenever it gets triggered.
